snippet.title: Pokémon Fool's Gold Trailer
snippet.description:
A couple of friends and I have been working hard at a Pokémon Crystal ROM hack for the past year or so and it's finally complete! 

In this game, all of the Pokémon have been reworked... think Alolan/Galarian forms, for all the Pokémon. All 251 Pokémon are available in-game without trading, too. We've reworked all of the trainers and wild encounters to fit as well. In addition, there have been a few visual tweaks, and we've added a few new places to explore, too!

It's not a super technically impressive ROM hack but we've put a ton of work into it and we're really proud of the end result!

If you want to play it, here's a patch to be applied the original Pokémon Crystal ROM:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1QJbMI26C0cX8va2Fi95WLesr5QarwMiW?usp=sharing

For legal reasons we can't provide the pre-patched ROM, but if for whatever reason you have a vanilla Pokémon Crystal ROM you can apply the .ips patch to it with a program such as LunarIPS :)

Also, check out our tumblr! We'll be posting some art we made to celebrate the release, as well as answering any questions! pokefoolsgold.tumblr.com

Edit 4/15/2020: We now have a discord server! https://discord.gg/xMA9Udq
